pkgmetadata.longdescription: # bareutilsUtilities for [bareASGI](https://github.com/rob-blackbourn/bareASGI)and [bareClient](https://github.com/rob-blackbourn/bareClient)(read the [docs](https://rob-blackbourn.github.io/bareUtils/)).## InstallationThe package can be installed with pip.```bashpip install bareutils```This is a Python3.7 and later package.
